name: Aurelia Release Notes - 12/24/2016
description: As always, we continue to make improvements to Aurelia. Below is a list of changes in this week's set of updates.
content:
As always, we continue to make improvements to Aurelia. Below is a list of changes in this week's set of updates.

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-pal 1.2.0](https://github.com/aurelia/pal/compare/1.1.1...v1.2.0)

#### Features

* **index:** add PLATFORM.moduleName ([da92298](https://github.com/aurelia/pal/commit/da92298))

## Patch Releases

Patch updates include only fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-metadata 1.0.3](https://github.com/aurelia/metadata/compare/1.0.2...v1.0.3)

#### Bug Fixes

* **metadata:** handle primitive targets ([ecf28dd](https://github.com/aurelia/metadata/commit/ecf28dd)), closes [aurelia/templating-resources#267](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-resources/issues/267) [aurelia/metadata#47](https://github.com/aurelia/metadata/issues/47) [aurelia/binding#551](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/issues/551) [aurelia/dependency-injection#141](https://github.com/aurelia/dependency-injection/issues/141) [aurelia/binding#376](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/issues/376)

### [aurelia-dependency-injection 1.2.1](https://github.com/aurelia/dependency-injection/compare/1.2.0...v1.2.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **autoinject:** prevent changing inject of parent classes ([aa38a34](https://github.com/aurelia/dependency-injection/commit/aa38a34))
* **container:** check for custom registration before bubbling ([98739f2](https://github.com/aurelia/dependency-injection/commit/98739f2))

### [aurelia-bootstrapper 2.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/bootstrapper/compare/2.0.0...v2.0.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* Correctly detect NWJS.

### [aurelia-valiation 1.0.0-beta.1.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/compare/1.0.0-beta.1.0.0...v1.0.0-beta.1.0.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **build:** correct es2015 and native-modules builds ([d749cf5](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/commit/d749cf5))
* **package:** fix doc build ([9e79087](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/commit/9e79087))
* **ValidationController:** keep errors property in sync ([658ab0f](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/commit/658ab0f)), closes [#396](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/issues/396)
